item.description:
Join together with several permaculture members for another Do-It-Yourself Craft Night in Portland on Munjoy Hill (location likely to rotate in future).  Bring along knitting, sewing or any small crafts you're interested in working on while meeting with kindred spirits in our group.  All abilities and craft types are encouraged to attend.

Permaculture has a strong DIY ethos and as we move into the "darker months" this is a great opportunity to meet in small groups.

This is not a potluck meal event, but feel free to bring drinks or snacks to share.  Feel free to use the comments area of this page to talk about what kind of craft you might want to bring to the event or other similar "small circle" events you might be interested in seeing happen.

------------------------

Please note, there are limited spaces for this event.  If you RSVP "Yes" you will be holding a space that someone else cannot sign up for.  Please take your RSVP as seriously as you can (i.e. this is different than a facebook RSVP:) and if you think you can't make it, please change your RSVP with as much notice as possible in case there is someone on the waiting list who can go!  Thanks for your help. -- LisaF (Organizer)

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: Portland Permaculture DIY Craft Night
